thread.title: Just Back: Venice and the Italian Alps
thread.title_full: Just Back: Venice and the Italian Alps - SFGate

author: sfgate.com
title: Just Back: Venice and the Italian Alps
text:
Why I went: Good friends suggested we join them to see the Biennale Art Exhibition in Venice and hike in the Italian Alps.
Don't miss: A ride on a spectacular cable car in glamorous Cortina d’Ampezzo where Roger Moore played James Bond in “For Your Eyes Only .”
Don't bother: The hoi polloi at St. Mark’s Square. Too many cruise ship tourists.
Coolest souvenir: The gorgeous glass available on the island of Murano.
Worth a splurge: A great tour company for hiking in the Dolomites. We chose Backroads, a local outfit based in Berkeley. Our leaders were fantastic.
Wish I'd packed: Waterproof hiking clothes.
